title: Add subtly styled creator credit to site footer

requirements.text: Add a subtly styled footer credit reading “Created by Gauri Jadhav” in the global site footer, placed alongside the existing caffeine.ai credit (without removing or changing the existing caffeine.ai link).

quotes: I want it in the footer. Phrase it as Created by Gauri Jadhav as a subtly styled footer credit

acceptanceCriteria: On all pages, the footer displays the exact text “Created by Gauri Jadhav”.
The creator credit is visually subtle (e.g., same muted/secondary text style as existing footer text) and does not dominate the footer.
The existing “Built with … using caffeine.ai” credit and its link remain present and functional (no removal/regression).
Footer layout remains responsive: on mobile and desktop, footer content does not overflow and maintains readable spacing/alignment.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components must be composed, not modified).
Do not modify any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the existing caffeine.ai footer link URL and tracking parameters unchanged.
nonGoals: Adding a new page (About/Contact) for creator information.
Adding backend-stored creator metadata or an admin UI to edit the footer credit.
Changing the site’s overall theme, typography system, or header/navigation.
